outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to empower National Supply Company (CONAB) found new challenges in order to meet the demands of the Federal Government and thus, consequently, contribute to reducing social inequalities, to promote social welfare and development of the country, strengthening increasingly their position within the national context. The project will achieve this through the following 7 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) Evaluation System of CONAB's performance, (ii) Modernization of the Information Technology Company, (iii) Improvement of crop forecasting methodology, (iv) Structuring of networks of production and marketing of regional products coming from family farms and extraction, on a social and environmental sustainable basis, (v) Promoting the efficiency of supply chains of fish from fisheries and aquaculture family, (vi) Elaboration of a National Supply organizing a proposal for implementing the government program and (vii) Impact Assessment of the Food Acquisition Program in agrarian reform settlements.
